monthlyBreakdown.title: Monthly breakdown
monthlyBreakdown.empty: No data to display. Start by adding budget categories and transactions.

fields.name: Name of income source
fields.amountDescription: The amount you expect to earn from this source.
fields.isRecurringDescription: Marking this income source as recurring will automatically be visible in future budget periods. Be aware that as of now, deleting a recurring item for one month will propogate to every month.

addDrawer.title: Add a budget category
addDrawer.description: A budget category is a logical group of categorized transactions. For example, "Groceries", or "Bills" would be the groups you want to allocate money each month towards.

fields.name: Name of category
fields.budgetAmountDescription: The most amount of money you would like to spend on this category this month. Don't worry, you can adjust this value later.
fields.isRecurringDescription: Marking this category as recurring will automatically be visible in future budget periods. Be aware that as of now, deleting a recurring item for one month will propogate to every month.
